name: Little Life: Island Tales
storyline:
Imagine leaving behind endless meetings and the incessant ping of notifications marked "99+," and embarking on a fresh start in a picturesque coastal town. This is the promise of Little Life: Idyllic Town Tales – an opportunity to escape urban chaos and return to a simpler way of living.

In this game, you'll trade your white-collar job in the big city for life in this scenic village, where the pace slows down and everyone feels like a friendly neighbor. You have the freedom to choose your lifestyle: one day you might be a salesperson peddling local specialties, the next tending to your own farm, and later, perhaps, become a diver exploring the depths of the ocean.

Over time, you'll find yourself settling into the town, acquiring a cherished vehicle, a cozy villa, and maybe even meeting that special someone. Planting vegetables in your own garden, petting your house cat, and savoring every bit of simplicity and purity in life.
summary: Imagine leaving behind endless meetings and the constant ping of "99+ notifications," and embarking on a brand new life in a picturesque seaside town. This is the promise of Little Life: Island Tales – an opportunity to escape the hustle and bustle of the city and return to a simpler way of living.
